description: Data of biosamples from human patients. Adapted from Table 2 of http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HUL.InstRepos:32725809. This template should be used when biosamples are from NF patients to provides a more valuable characterization and make additional gene-phenotype insights possible.

individualID.description: A unique identifier (non-PII) that represents the individual from which the data came. This could be a patient or animal ID.
individualID.title: individualID

sex.description: Phenotypic expression of chromosomal makeup that defines a study subject as male, female, or other.
sex.title: sex

age.description: A numeric value representing age of the individual. Use with `ageUnit`.
age.title: age

enum: High Grade Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumor
diagnosis.title: diagnosis

nf1Genotype.description: Genotype of NF1 gene in the biospecimen from which the data were derived, if known.
nf1Genotype.title: nf1Genotype

nf2Genotype.description: Genotype of NF2 gene in the biospecimen from which the data were derived, if known
nf2Genotype.title: nf2Genotype

cafeaulaitMacules.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
cafeaulaitMacules.title: vascularDisease

skinFoldFreckling.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
skinFoldFreckling.title: vascularDisease

IrisLischNodules.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
IrisLischNodules.title: vascularDisease

dermalNeurofibromas.description: Enumerations describing how neurofibromas can manifest more generally.
dermalNeurofibromas.title: subcutaneousNodularNeurofibromas

subcutaneousNodularNeurofibromas.description: Enumerations describing how neurofibromas can manifest more generally.
subcutaneousNodularNeurofibromas.title: subcutaneousNodularNeurofibromas

diffuseDermalNeurofibromas.description: Enumerations describing how neurofibromas can manifest more generally.
diffuseDermalNeurofibromas.title: subcutaneousNodularNeurofibromas

spinalNeurofibromas.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of spinal neurofibromas, combining information on presence and the cervical locations.
spinalNeurofibromas.title: spinalNeurofibromas

plexiformNeurofibromas.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of plexiform neurofibromas, combining information on presence and the certainty via MRI imaging technique.
plexiformNeurofibromas.title: plexiformNeurofibromas

opticGlioma.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of optic gliomas, combining information on presence, symptoms, and treatment.
opticGlioma.title: opticGlioma

heartDefect.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
heartDefect.title: vascularDisease

vascularDisease.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
vascularDisease.title: vascularDisease

stature.description: Enumerations corresponding to 3 bins using 2 standard deviations as a cutoff.
stature.title: stature

peripheralNeuropathy.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
peripheralNeuropathy.title: vascularDisease

aqueductalStenosis.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
aqueductalStenosis.title: vascularDisease

longBoneDysplasia.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
longBoneDysplasia.title: vascularDisease

sphenoidDysplasia.title: vascularDisease

scoliosis.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
scoliosis.title: vascularDisease

intellectualDisability.title: vascularDisease

learningDisability.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
learningDisability.title: vascularDisease

attentionDeficitDisorder.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
attentionDeficitDisorder.title: vascularDisease

pheochromocytoma.title: vascularDisease

glomusTumor.title: vascularDisease

MPNSTCharacterization.title: vascularDisease

nonopticGlioma.title: vascularDisease

breastCancer.title: vascularDisease

otherTumors.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
otherTumors.title: vascularDisease

vestibularSchwannoma.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of tumors confirmed via imaging (MRI or other), where lateral information is most relevant.
vestibularSchwannoma.title: vestibularSchwannoma

meningioma.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of tumors confirmed via imaging with one or multiple sites being the most relevant result.
meningioma.title: spinalSchwannoma

gliomaOrEpendymoma.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of tumors confirmed via imaging with mainly absent or present being the most relevant result.
gliomaOrEpendymoma.title: nonvestibularCranialSchwannoma

spinalSchwannoma.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of tumors confirmed via imaging with one or multiple sites being the most relevant result.
spinalSchwannoma.title: spinalSchwannoma

dermalSchwannoma.title: vascularDisease

nonvestibularCranialSchwannoma.title: nonvestibularCranialSchwannoma

lenticularOpacity.title: vascularDisease

enum: 2 or more, at least 1 pathogically confirmed

numberOfSchwannomas.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of schwannomas.
numberOfSchwannomas.title: numberOfSchwannomas
